text:
Mechanisms of Action The mechanisms by which antipsychotics interact

with THC are not fully understood. However, research suggests that the

cannabinoid system plays a role in modulating the effects of antipsychotics (6).

Conclusion In conclusion, the use of antipsychotics in conjunction with THC

has been shown to have potential therapeutic benefits. However, further

research is needed to fully understand the mechanisms of action and to

determine the optimal dosing regimens for these substances.

Recommendations
